name: Catacomb Rush
description:
A puzzle-platformer made for the 40 Hours Game Jam! The theme was "10 seconds".

In this game you play as an adventurer trying to escape an ancient tomb. If you don't get out in 10 seconds you lose!

Features:

  • Platform movement style.
  • Three different stages.
  • Rage, probably.

Credits:

  • Programming, graphics and game design by Luis Moreira
  • Music and Sound Effects are from cc0 files on freesound.org.
